Document: ## Pizzas -Margherita Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Cheese Wedge + 4 Tomatos for 30 seconds -Mushroom Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 5 Chantrelle Clusters for 30 seconds -Meat Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 3 Raw Meat + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Tomato for 30 seconds -Vegetable Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Eggplant + 1 Carrot + 1 Corn + 1 Tomato for 30 seconds -Hawaiian Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 3 Raw Chicken Cutlet + 5 Pineapple Slices for 30 seconds -Dank Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 3 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Tomato for 30 seconds -Donk-Pocket Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 3 Warm-Donk-Pockets + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Tomato for 30 seconds -Firecracker Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Baked Corn + 1 Chili + 10 BBQ Sauce for 30 seconds -Quattro Formaggi Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Mozzarella + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Cheese Curds + 10u Tomato Sauce for 30 seconds -Pesto Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 2 Tomatos + 2 Mozzarella + 10u Pesto Sauce for 30 seconds -Cotton Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Mozzarella + 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Cotton + 5u Corn Oil for 30 seconds -Corncob Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 6 Corn + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Tomato + 1 Stick of Butter for 30 seconds
